required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Systems Saving Lives - Long-term Survival of Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest in the Urban Area of Bologna
clinical_study.official_title: Systems Saving Lives - Long-term Survival of Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest in the Urban Area of Bologna Following the Implementation of the Pre-arrival Instructions, the DAE RespondER, Mechanical Chest Compressors and Circulatory Support With REBOA and ECMO

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of clinical, logistical, and technical factors (e.g. implementation of pre-arrival instructions, implementation of the DAE RespondER, mechanical chest compressor, REBOA, and E-CPR) that impact on the outcomes of out-of-hospital cardiac arrest patients.

primary_outcome.description: ROSC (Return of spontaneous circulation) of cardiac arrest patients
Hospital admission status of cardiac arrest patients
Hospital discharge status/survival at 30 days of cardiac arrest patients

secondary_outcome.description: Survival at 6 months of cardiac arrest patients
Survival at 1 years of cardiac arrest patients

arm_group.description: Out of hospital cardiac arrest patients (Historical cohort) from 1st January 2009 and 30th June 2020. Out of hospital cardiac arrest patients from 1st July 2020 and 31st December 2025.

intervention.description: Observational study with standard cardiac arrest approach

study_pop.textblock: Population served by EMS of Bologna area

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Out of Hospital cardiac arrest patients (historical cohort) from 1st January 2009 and 30th June 2020
- Out of Hospital cardiac arrest patients from 1st July 2020 and 31st December 2025
Exclusion Criteria:
- False cardiac arrest
- In-hospital cardiac arrest

overall_official.affiliation: Maggiore Hospital Carlo Alberto Pizzardi AUSL di Bologna

facility.name: Maggiore Hospital Ospedale Maggiore Carlo Alberto Pizzardi AUSL di Bologna
